-- First and second hint
wo[{16,6}] = {"it_document", text = "text1"} function timer_hint(is_on, sender) wo[{16,6}] = {"it_document", text = "text2"} end
-- A sender may never kill itself (at least for now), -- so we have to put a timer inbetween (at least for now).
function timer_kill(is_on, sender) local x, y = po(sender):xy() if (y == 1) or (y == 2) then wo[{x,4*y}] = {"st_nil"} elseif (y == 10) or (y == 11) then wo[{x,5 + (y-10)*2}] = {"st_nil"} wo[{x,7 - (y-10)*2}] = ti[lib.lua.cond(y == 10, "H", "G")] mainoxyd:closeall() mainoxyd:shuffle() end end
-- Fourswitch callback
solved = false function fourswitch_callback(is_on, sender) local x = (po(sender)).x if solved then -- y is 4 or 8 st(x,po(sender).y/4):on() else solved = true for j = 1,18 do solved = solved and fl(j,5)._dir == st(j,4).state and fl(j,7)._dir == st(j,8).state end end end
-- Switch callback
function switch_callback(is_on, sender) st(po(sender).x, lib.lua.cond(po(sender).y == 5, 10, 11)):on() end
